statements: UPDATE customer_interactions SET email_address='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type='call' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_timestamp='2023-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id=3;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Support', email_address = 'support@company.com' WHERE customer_id = 98765;
UPDATE customer_emails SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE email_engagement SET open_count = 10 WHERE email_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_emails SET interaction_type = 'clicked' WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE customer_emails SET email_address = 'new_email@example.com', interaction_time = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE email_engagement SET open_count = open_count + 1, click_count = click_count + 1 WHERE email_id = 101;

UPDATE customer_emails ce JOIN email_engagement ee ON ce.customer_id = ee.email_id SET ce.email_address = 'updated_email@example.com', ee.email_subject = 'New Subject', ee.open_count = ee.open_count + 2 WHERE ce.customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='New Customer Name' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE emails SET email_subject='Update Email Subject' WHERE email_id=1;
UPDATE email_engagement SET engagement_type='Clicked' WHERE engagement_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET email_subject = 'New Offer', send_date = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE email_id = 2;
UPDATE email_engagement SET engagement_type = 'Opened', engagement_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE engagement_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE marketing_emails SET subject = 'New Sale!' WHERE email_id = 1
UPDATE email_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Clicked' WHERE interaction_id = 1
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE marketing_emails SET subject = 'New Offer' WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE email_interactions SET interaction_date = '2023-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE interaction_id = 100;
UPDATE Customer_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'call' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Emails_Sent SET sent_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Email_Responses SET response_count = 10 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Customer_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email' WHERE interaction_type = 'Email Response';
UPDATE Emails_Sent SET sent_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE sent_date < '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Email_Clicks SET click_count = click_count + 1 WHERE email_id = 12345;
